text: Hey, Sarah. My computer is acting up. I can't open any files. Oh, that's frustrating. Have you tried restarting it? Yes, I did, but it didn't work. Okay, no worries. You might want to check if there's enough storage space on your hard drive. Sometimes that causes issues. How do I do that? Just right click on the hard drive icon and select properties. It'll show you the available space. Got it. Thanks. I'll give that a shot.
